animeTitle: Arei no Kagami: Way to the Virgin Space
otherNames: Arei's Mirror ~ Way to the Virgin Space, アレイの鏡 ~ Way to the Virgin Space
synopsis: The story follows Daichi Meguru and Mayu, a young boy and a pilot, as they flee their war torn planet and into space. Upon their ship a stowaway android named Zero joins their quest as they travel through Halley's Mirror.
animeImg: https://gogocdn.net/images/Arei no Kagami - Way to the Virgin Space.jpg
